Constructor Detail

ComputeAll


public ComputeAll(String costFile,

                  String stFile,

                  double corridorWidth,

                  String outputDir)

           throws IOException
This object stores the basic information to perform shortest path and CMTC computations.

Parameters:
String - costFile: the ascii file containing the relative cost raster
String - stFile: the ascii file containing the position of source and target pixels
int - numPaths: the number of paths to be computed
double - corridor width: the width of the corridor
String - outputDir: the directory where results are written to
Throws:
IOException
Method Detail

computeCMTC


public void computeCMTC()
Calculates the Cumulative Minimum Transit Cost.

computePath


public void computePath()
Calculates one shortest path and marks the vertex array indicating path location.

main


public static void main(String[] args)

                 throws IOException
This is the way to perform all shortest path calculations using the command line.

Parameters:
String - args[0] cost file
String - args[1] st file
double - args[2] corridor width (0-100)
String - args[3] output directory
int - args[4] number of shortest paths
Throws:
IOException

writeResults


public void writeResults()

                  throws IOException
Writes MSPs and CMTC to an ascii raster and saves stats as a text file.

Throws:
IOException
